item.title: Apex Legends
item.description: Image stolen from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1172470/Apex_Legends/ So over my winter break I’ve been doing a little gaming here and there. One day, my friends invited me to play Apex Legends. So I decided to hop check out protondb and give it a try. Much to my luck Apex Legends actually works (with a few tweaks). Pretty much, all you have to do is run this line through the Steam launcher’s launch options:
